workshoptitle: The Title of the Workshop is defined in the manifest

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Database Connection
tutorials.description: Connecting to AI Vector Search database in Oracle's environment (sandbox)

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Vector Embeddings
tutorials.description: Vectors and vector embeddings in AI Vector Search

tutorials.title: Lab 5: APEX Demo
tutorials.description: Running AI Vector Search in an APEX application

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
